1.content: Simply put this chapter is to decide if you want to go through the story as a boy or a girl so pick away
1.title: Who will you choose

12.content:
So you just knocked off for summer vacation and you want to hang out with one of your mates and do something and you have 5 friends close enough to you but who do you go out with

Amber who lives right next to you that you have known your whole life and your BFF

Kate your nerdy friend who you study with and have known the 2nd longest

Nikki your friend who you play online games with

Angela your sisters friend who you are close with

and finally Ashley your friend from England who comes to America every summer on vacation and hands out with you and your friends
12.title: Go through as a girl

info.brief_description: A simple story of you being tickled or tickling your female friends
info.description:
In this story you will have the choice of tickling or being tickled by your female friends as well as tickling and pleasuring their private parts

Rules

No male friends will tickle you or be tickled by you the only time a male will be tickled is if you choose to go through the story as a male

You can tickle any part of the body and I do mean any part you may also pleasure the girls private parts as well but strictly no intercourse

Strictly no physical harm to the ticklee or tickler

No extreme fetishes like vore and stuff like that

Try to make chapters long but if you can't that's fine

Don't be afraid to add to the story

And finally enjoy the stories
info.pretty_title: Tickle or be tickled by your friends
